ygData.subject: Re: Weapon prices and locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Any idea on where to look for one for sale?  Just got to unrest and hang around? or one of the closer cites?  Also does anyone have any idea where the
ygData.messageBody:
Any idea on where to look for one for sale? Just got to unrest
and hang around? or one of the closer cites? Also does anyone have any
idea where the Crystalline sword can be found? the quoted stats on
EQ'liser (spoiler site) sounds very impressive, so I'm sure it's very
hard to get also.


Bashlor the Quizzical Barb from Bertox
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kazruk [SMTP:tcashio3@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 5:48 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Weapon prices and locations
>
> From: "Kazruk" <tcashio3@...>
>
> Market is saturated. Barbed whips easily found for 50p-75p. In a
> couple
> weeks it will be less. =(
>
